    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_DEFAULT
      This is the default value (in milliseconds) how often a config file is to be checked for modification (value=60000L )
      static long FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_MAX
      This is the maximum value (in milliseconds) after that a config file is being checked for modification.
      static long FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_MIN
      This is the minimum value (in milliseconds) after that a config file is being checked for modification.
      static java.lang.String FILE_RELOAD_PARAMETER
      If this parameter () is found in a config file, its value will be used to override the default (as defined in FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_DEFAULT )

      • Fields inherited from class com.softwareag.wx.is.config.file.reload.FileReloadStrategy

    • Field Detail

      • FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_DEFAULT

        public static final long FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_DEFAULT
        This is the default value (in milliseconds) how often a config file is to be checked for modification (value=60000L )
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_MIN

        public static final long FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_MIN
        This is the minimum value (in milliseconds) after that a config file is being checked for modification. If a value lower than this is provided in a config file, it will be overridden by this ( 500L)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_MAX

        public static final long FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_MAX
        This is the maximum value (in milliseconds) after that a config file is being checked for modification. If a value higher than this is provided in a config file, it will be overridden by this ( 600000L)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_RELOAD_PARAMETER

        public static final java.lang.String FILE_RELOAD_PARAMETER
        If this parameter () is found in a config file, its value will be used to override the default (as defined in FILE_RELOAD_INTERVAL_DEFAULT )
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
